#include <stdio.h>
#include <math.h>
long long int isPrime(long long int a);

int main()
{
	long long int t, a, b;
	scanf("%lld", &t);
	while(t--) {
		scanf("%lld%lld", &a, &b);
		for(; b >= a; b--) {
			if(isPrime(b))
				continue;
			printf("%lld\n", b);
			break;
		}
		
		if(b < a)printf("-1\n");
	}
	return 0;
}
 
long long int isPrime(long long int a)
{
	long long int c, i;
	if(a == 2)return 1;
	if(!(a%2))return 0;
	c = (int)sqrt(a);
	for(i = 3; i <= c; i += 2)
		if(!(a % i)) return 0;
			return 1;
}
